content.full_text: Halsey O. Merriman and Amos L. Merriman to Abraham Lincoln, 3 February 18521
paragraphs: Halsey O. Merriman and Amos L. Merriman to Abraham Lincoln, 3 February 18521

footnotes.text: 1Halsey O. Merriman wrote and signed this telegram.

2No additional correspondence between either Abraham Lincoln and Halsey O. Merriman
                  or Lincoln and Amos L. Merriman has been located. Lincoln was not working with either
                  of the Merrimans on any legal cases at the time of this telegram, so it is unclear
                  what requisition the Merrimans were referencing.

structured_content.text: Halsey O. Merriman and Amos L. Merriman to Abraham Lincoln, 3 February 18521
